translations: v．欺骗，哄骗：通过欺诈手段或巧言令色使人上当受骗。
· He cozened the old lady out of her money.
他骗取了那位老太太的钱。

sentences.sentence: He cozened me, despite my care.
sentences.translation: 虽然我很小心，他还是把我骗了。

sentences.sentence: He cozened the money out of the old man.
Her uncle cozened her out of her inheritance.
sentences.translation: 叔叔诱使她放弃了继承权。
